gold.user: As an enterprise admin, I want to retrieve a list of all teams in my enterprise to manage team permissions and access.
gold.ideal: A successful response with a list of teams, including their names, slugs, and IDs.

gold.user: As an enterprise admin, I want to create a new team in my enterprise so that I can organize members by projects.
gold.ideal: A successful response with the details of the newly created team, including its ID and slug.

gold.user: As a team member, I want to view the details of my team to understand its purpose and members.
gold.ideal: A successful response with the team's details, including its name, members, and permissions.

gold.user: As a team maintainer, I want to update my team's name and description to reflect our current focus.
gold.ideal: A successful response confirming the update with the new team details.

gold.user: As an enterprise admin, I want to delete a team that is no longer needed to keep the organization clean.
gold.ideal: A successful response confirming the deletion of the team.
